attributes.action: Fund the BBC to keep Neighbours on BBC1.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The popular Australian televison show Neighbours today moved channel to channel 5. The avalibility of this channel does not reflect the demand for Neighbours, as channel 5 is not widely available for the majority of watchers, especially the student majority who watch it! Mr. Brown, please save Neighbours!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
